thread.title: Manager, Running Specialty Tech Rep-Chicago - Sports Equipment
thread.title_full: Manager, Running Specialty Tech Rep-Chicago - Sports Equipment

title: Manager, Running Specialty Tech Rep-Chicago - Sports Equipment
text: Posted/Updated: 10-24-2015 Brief Job Description: Coach and direct team on ways to increase retail sales staff engagement with key accounts for the brand through initiatives such as tech clinics, product launch programs, promoting sales contests and seeding.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
